CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV and MOT enter room . INV explains warm-up period to MOT
CHI looks down then at facing wall
MOT looks at toys on the floor
MOT squats down and stands CHI on the floor keeping one arm around his waist
MOT draws jack+in+the+box closer to them
CHI's face is not visible as he is behind MOTs head . CHI is apparently watching MOT through the next seven utterances
MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes clown into box with one hand
MOT turns handle then the clown pops up

INV enters room and explains Forbidden Object Activity

CHAT.comment: MOT keeps two objects from the Small Scale Activity in front of CHI as a possible means of distraction
